```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
```

## Input

```{r}
#| label: readin-input
tibble(x = read_lines("input/01")) |> 
  separate_wider_regex(x, 
                       c(first = "\\d+", "\\s+", second = "\\d+")) |> 
  mutate(across(everything(), \(x) as.numeric(x) |> sort())) |> 
  mutate(diff = abs(second - first)) |> 
  summarise(sum = sum(diff))
```
